text:
Hello,
I need to integrate content by an API and i want to render content on dynamics page.
For exemple: With my API i have list of product and i want to render a product displayed block in list. When i clic on display i want to go to one page to render the full content of my product page.

Itâ€™s possible to do that without to create a HubDB ? <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-dynamic-pages-with-hubdb>

You could use the CMS page publishing API. On the overview page you have a module with a field that contains all the teaser information you want to show. And with the hubl `formjson` filter you create the markup and content. You can create, update and delete the product pages with the same API.
